name: Sérendipité
description:
August 2005, you're browsing the web for a few years now. And you're about to enter a unknown territory.

Consume good content, avoid bad ones. And above all, be careful on what's you clicking on.

This game is based on my personal experience of browsing english websites as a kid without understanding anything. Clicking at random lead to unexpected result, sometime good, but often very unwelcome.

Graphics:

  • Flaticon, typodermicfonts

Audio FX:

  • Luke.RUSTLTD
  • pauliuw
  • NenadSimic

Music:

  • Pro Sensory - Elevator Music 2
  • Ville Nousiainen - Fast fight
